short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and share your links with the Linkfire Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Linkfire is all about links, because great links are key to every campaign. Our suite of link-related tools helps marketeers to increase clicks, improve conversion and heighten relevance. We call it "Link smarter, Convert better.

Our Service includes: 
Link shortening and customisation 
Redirection based on country/city, device type and time 
Mobile app deep linking 
Call-to-action banner embedding 
And much moreâ€¦

NB: This is the 1st release of the Linkfire Chrome Extension. Our current API only lets you shorten links on the fly but an updated release is on the way. 

Have questions or need help? Send us an email to help@linkfire.com
